author: bnicholes
msg: Implement the util_ldap_cache_getuserdn() API so that the ldap authorization only modules have access to the util_ldap user cache without having to require ldap authentication as well.  [PR 31898]

author: jorton
msg: - switch default session cache to shmcb
- remove comment on using shmht which has been removed

author: jorton
msg: Add -t -DDUMP_CERTS option to mod_ssl which dumps the filenames of all
configured SSL certificates to stdout, useful for cron-ing through a
"do I need to renew any of my certificates this week" tool:

author: jorton
msg: hide all global symbols defined by mod_ssl other than the module
